org.elephant.mapper
Interface EleMappable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Room, EleVector, EleMap, Exit
public interface EleMappable

An interface that needs to be implemented by all objects that wish to be present on the graphical map, that will be saved/loaded and that will be exported to LPC.

Copyright (c) 2001
